title: Simulate spinner with three unequal sections

content.description:
A spinner is divided into three sections. The sector labeled  is four times as large as each of the sectors labeled  and , which are of equal size.

The procedure below is intended to simulate the behavior of the spinner.
content.question: Which of the following can be used to replace  so that the procedure correctly simulates the spinner?

choices.label: The block code consists of 6 lines. Line 1: spin, left arrow, RANDOM begin block, 1 comma 3, end block Begin block Line 2: IF, begin block, spin equals 1, end block Begin block Line 3, indented 1 tab: RETURN, begin block, quotation mark, Red, quotation mark, end block End block End block Begin block Line 4: IF, begin block, spin equals 2, end block Begin block Line 5, indented 1 tab: RETURN, begin block, quotation mark, Yellow, quotation mark, end block End block End block Line 6: RETURN, begin block, quotation mark, Blue, quotation mark, end block
